data.title: Showboat Hotel Atlantic City
data.meta_description: Book directly at the Showboat Hotel Atlantic City to get the best rate guaranteed during your stay at Atlantic City's most family-friendly & pet-friendly hotel.
data.text:
Come Get Lucky

At Lucky Snake

The largest arcade in the East has arrived at Showboat Hotel Atlantic City! Bring your competitive side and childhood nostalgia to this massive 60,000-square-foot arcade featuring more than 300 action-packed games, including virtual reality, pinball, and glow mini-golf. Then fuel up at our sports bar with a full menu catering to all ages.

Learn More

At Lucky Snake

The largest arcade in the East has arrived at Showboat Hotel Atlantic City! Bring your competitive side and childhood nostalgia to this massive 60,000-square-foot arcade featuring more than 300 action-packed games, including virtual reality, pinball, and glow mini-golf. Then fuel up at our sports bar with a full menu catering to all ages.

Learn More

Top Reasons To Stay

The Curtain Rises—Always

As Atlantic City’s premier convention and event hotspot, you’re not only a guest, you’re an audience member. From powerhouse vocalists and pulsating bands to car shows and specialty gigs, it’s not a question of if you’ll applaud, it’s how much with our hote’s Atlantic City events.

Learn More

Top Reasons To Stay

All AC’s A Stage

Explore the finest our city has to offer steps from our front door. Stroll the famous Atlantic City Boardwalk, splash away at the beach, and dine at the best restaurants in Atlantic City.

Learn More

Top Reasons To Stay

Just Fun & Games

You don’t need us to tell you where Lady Luck lives in this town. We’ll entertain the kids while you find out if the Golden Lady favors you at eight world-class casinos around our hotel.

Learn More

Top Reasons To Stay

Starring Flavor

At the Showboat Hotel Atlantic City, flavor has always been the star of the show. Your taste buds will thank you as you take them on a tour of classic Atlantic City surf cuisine at our newly expanded bars and eateries. Bring your appetite to the Boardwalk.

Learn More

Top Reasons To Stay

Pets Play Too

We’re the first of the Atlantic City Boardwalk hotels to welcome pets. That means we know how important it is your furry friend be treated as our guest. Our “Boardwalk Bow-Wow” package features organic treats for your pup and easy access to our on-site pet park, so your favorite companion can get just as much as you do from the Atlantic City Boardwalk.

Learn More

Conventions

Claim Your Stage

With more space than any other hotel on the Boardwalk, your interests have plenty of room to grow at the Showboat Hotel.

Learn More

Special Events

The Party Starts Here

Don’t let planning take the fun out of your next event. Leave the details to us while you get back to entertaining in AC.

Learn More
